divs: sighting detailswas at metaphor cafe on 2nd street in escondido, ca. around 7pm (shortly before possibly) everyone ran outside to see something weird in the sky. i followed and what i saw was really strange. it was like a saucer shape with flashing red and blue lights, and it was still. it wasn't moving... which made us able to identify the shape. then it slowly began to lower, and it eventually disappeared among trees where we couldn't see anymore. someone was able to get it on video and posted it on youtube. i looked today. *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg).
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Escondido
There was one other sighting in Escondido on or around February 26th 2011
